TQL: SELECT name,customId, region.name, isGlobal FROM bill_items

SELECT tour.name,employee.name,performedBy.name,status, date(startedOn) as 'start_date', endedOn,durationMinutes, left_str(right_str(startDateTime,14),8) as 'start_time',endDateTime FROM checkpoint_tour_sessions WHERE date(startedOn) = '2021-04-13'
SELECT name,instructions,account.name, position.name,active, scanActionType, scanActionMessage, scanReportTemplate, scanCode FROM checkpoints

SELECT region.name,customId,tags,company,firstName,lastName,primaryPhone,secondaryPhone,faxNumber,email,website,type,address.addressLine1,address.addressLine2,address.city,address.country,address.state,address.postalCode FROM clients where type in ('SERVICE_LOCATION','CLIENT')

SELECT concat(region.name, ' [[', region.id, ']]') as region, customId as site_id,parentClient.customId as mastersite_id, company as `*company`, jobTitle as job_title,firstName as first_name, lastName as last_name, primaryPhone as phone_main, secondaryPhone as phone_other, faxNumber as fax, email, address.addressLine1 as `*address`, address.city as `*city`, concat('[[',address.state,']]') as `state`,concat('[[',address.country,']]') as `*country`,address.postalCode as `zip`, timeZone as timezone, concat('[[',if(status = ACTIVE"
column7: notes as instructions as address_suite FROM clients limit 2000"

TQL: SELECT employee.customId,employee.name, account.customId,account.name, active,payRate,startedOn,endedOn FROM employee_account_assignments
SELECT label,name,type,required,adminOnly,displayOrder,listItems,  reportTemplate.name FROM report_template_fields order by reportTemplate,name,displayOrder
SELECT name, portal,  region.name,isGlobal  FROM roles
